text: avan vanankalaiyum, pumiyaiyum unmaiyaik kontu pataittirukkiran; avane pakalin mitu iravaic currukiran; innum iravin mitu pakalaic currukiran; curiyanaiyum cantiranaiyum (tan atikkattirkul) vacappatuttinan, ivai ovvonrum kurippitata tavanaip pirakaram natakkinratu; (napiye!) Arintu kolviraka! Avan (yavaraiyum) mikaittavan; mika mannappavan
